name: Treasure Diver (Linkens)
description:
Treasure Diver

There's riches to be had for those who are brave enough to look. Sunken ships have spilled their hauls across the sea floor.  The glittering gold has attracted the attention of the local sea life, who now guard their treasures. Stories tell of a giant creature guarding the richest hoard...

Controls:

Arrow keys to move

X to fire

C to throw dynamite

Controller supported.

Gameplay:

Dodge the enemies' attacks as they shoot pieces of gold and throw themselves at you.

Collect 3 pieces of dynamite to build a full stick. The shock wave clears the current enemy projectiles and damages nearby enemies. Can only use 1 stick at a time.
